name: My Lovely Boxer
overview: Vanished genius boxer Kwon-sook and cold-hearted agent Tae-young risk all to defy match-fixing's clutches.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: At 17, Lee Kwon-sook, a talented boxer, becomes a sensation but vanishes before her grand slam. Now a kind-hearted kindergarten teacher, she conceals her tenacious “one-two punch” personality. Everything changes when she meets Kim Tae-young, an ice-cold and arrogant sports agent notorious for exploiting athletes, bleeding them dry, and forcing them into early retirement. He is furious upon discovering that Kim Hee-won, a brother-like figure and baseball pitcher, got involved in match-fixing due to Kim Oh-bok, an illegal sports gambling operator. Tae-young approaches Kwon-sook to help resolve Kim Hee-won's situation, knowing her boxing comeback would garner significant public interest. After persistent persuasion, the “Genius Boxer Who Hates Boxing's Final Retirement” project commences as planned by Tae-young, the exploitative retirement expert. With the sports industry tainted by match-fixing criminal organizations, will Kwon-sook, the genius boxer, be able to retire in glory?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Tae-young, an emotionless manager at Sports and Passion, is drawn into a tough situation when his brotherly friend, Hee-won, gets involved in illegal gambling. Tae-young steps in to help, but the culprits refuse to mend the harm caused by Hee-won's inability to meet his obligations legally. To save his life and Hee-won’s, Tae Young must find the vanished legendary boxer, Lee Kwon-sook.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Tae-young successfully tracks down Kwon-sook, who is now going by Yu-ri. With a tight deadline of three months, he must manage to settle a staggering sum, with the potential aftermath beyond his grasp. Whether Kwon-sook decides to step back into the ring or not holds Tae-young's fate and his very lifeline. Gradually, he starts appearing during Kwon-sook's morning runs, and the sustained annoyance he displays starts to trigger her interest.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Tae-young presents an offer to Kwon-sook, assuring her that he can fulfill her desires in a mere three months. Taking time to reflect, Kwon-sook eventually consents to partnering with him. Unfortunately, challenges arise right from the start. Meanwhile, love, an emotion that boxing had prevented Kwon-sook from experiencing, may be making its way to her.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In Kwon-sook's world, Jae-min is the exclusive source of her smiles. Conversely, Tae-young perceives Jae-min as a mere disturbance to the plans he and Kwon-sook have carefully crafted. Meanwhile, Soo-yeon assumes the position of Han Ah-reum’s manager. On the day of the match, Kwon-sook sits in the waiting room, trembling as though haunted by an intangible fear.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Tae-yong finds himself in an unforeseen situation when Gweon-suk brings him to her father's restaurant. Tae-young has no intention of revealing his prior encounter with Gweon-suk's father, but circumstances take an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Tae-young's minor scheme leads to the cancellation of Ah-reum's title defense match, causing Ah-reum to storm into Gweon-suk's gym.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Jae-min is concerned that the training might wear Gweon-suk down, while Tae-young is annoyed that his over-caring might soften Gweon-suk. Meanwhile, Gweon-suk feels somewhat disappointed in Tae-young, who leaves for Seoul right after taking Soo-yeon’s call. Oh-bok presses Tae-young, reminding him of the due date for the interest. Cornered, Tae-young resorts to cheating to arrange a boxing match between Ah-reum and Gweon-suk.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The challenge has now become official as Ah-reum has given her agreement, setting the stage for the match between Ah-reum and Gweon-suk. Meanwhile, Jae-min discusses the idea of becoming Gweon-suk's manager. In an unexpected turn, Soo-yeon accidentally spills the beans about Tae-young's plan to take Gweon-suk to the US for boxing, leaving Gweon-suk feeling quite displeased. It's during this moment that he catches wind of the news about Hee-won on TV.

1.name: Season 1

Tae-young approaches Kwon-sook to help resolve Kim Hee-won's situation, knowing her boxing comeback would garner significant public interest.
